data.title: Shinobu Ogawa
data.meta_description: Shinobu Ogawa (小川史生, Ogawa Shinobu) is a videogame and J-Pop music composer. He is the author of most of the Valis games' music soundtracks along with others like Minoru Yuasa and Hiroaki Kai. XZR (XZR 破戒の偶像) SA-ZI-RI (紫醜罹) Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei (デジタル・デビル物語 女神転生) Death Bringer...
data.text:
Birth Date:

Unknown

Decease Date:

None

Job:

Chief Composer in Telenet Japan (formerly) Composer

Shinobu Ogawa (小川史生, Ogawa Shinobu) is a videogame and J-Pop music composer. He is the author of most of the Valis games' music soundtracks along with others like Minoru Yuasa and Hiroaki Kai.

Musical works[]

Games[]

XZR (XZR 破戒の偶像)

SA-ZI-RI (紫醜罹)

Digital Devil Story: Megami Tensei (デジタル・デビル物語 女神転生)

Death Bringer (デスブリンガー)

Valis (夢幻戦士ヴァリス)

Valis II (ヴァリス2)

Valis III (ヴァリス3)

Maze-kun (めいず君)

Luxsor (ルクソール NIGHTS OVER EGYPT)

XZR II (エグザイルII)

Lady Phantom (レディファントム)

Last Alert (レッドアラード)

Cosmic Fantasy: Bouken Shounen Yuu (コズミックファンタジー 冒険少年ユウ)

Super Albatross (スーパーアルバトロス)

Angel's Poem (天使の詩)

Babel (BABEL)

Jantei Monogatiri (魔法の少女シルキーリップ 三人の女王候補)

Albatross 2 -Masters Tournament- (アルバトロス2 マスターズヒストリー)

A-Rank Thunder (Aランクサンダー)

Cyber City (サイバーシティ)
